description: Creates or updates the dataset refresh properties for the dataset.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

parameters.name: DataSetRefreshProperties
parameters.description: The dataset refresh properties. RefreshConfiguration (dict) --- The refresh configuration for a dataset. The incremental refresh for the dataset. The lookback window setup for an incremental refresh configuration. The name of the lookback window column. The lookback window column size. The size unit that is used for the lookback window column. Valid values for this structure are HOUR, DAY, and WEEK. FailureConfiguration (dict) --- The failure configuration for a dataset. EmailAlert (dict) --- The email alert configuration for a dataset refresh failure. AlertStatus (string) --- The status value that determines if email alerts are sent.

nested_params.name: RefreshConfiguration
nested_params.description: The refresh configuration for a dataset.

nested_params.name: IncrementalRefresh
nested_params.description: The incremental refresh for the dataset.

nested_params.name: LookbackWindow
nested_params.description: The lookback window setup for an incremental refresh configuration.

nested_params.name: ColumnName
nested_params.description: The name of the lookback window column.

nested_params.name: SizeUnit
nested_params.description: The size unit that is used for the lookback window column. Valid values for this structure are HOUR, DAY, and WEEK.

nested_params.name: FailureConfiguration
nested_params.description: The failure configuration for a dataset.

nested_params.name: EmailAlert
nested_params.description: The email alert configuration for a dataset refresh failure.

nested_params.name: AlertStatus
nested_params.description: The status value that determines if email alerts are sent.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
